Title: The Gathering
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Matthew B. Roberts (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Tobias Menzies, Gary Lewis
Plot: The Gathering shows Claire's attempt at her first real planned escape. The run-ins she has with various characters on the way include a major run-in with Dougal, and yet another moment with...
